name: @boywithkeyboard/brotli
author: Samuel Kopp (https://samuelkopp.de)
description: A pure JavaScript implementation of Brotli.

scripts.build: curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/google/brotli/master/js/decode.ts -o ./third_party/decode.ts && esbuild ./third_party/decode.ts --bundle --minify --format=esm --outfile=./third_party/decode.js && rimraf third_party/decode.ts && builder --esm --cjs && tsc
